description.en: Fountain Protocol is the first cross-chain lending platform powered by Oasis. The protocol enables users to experience high capital efficiency one-stop management of DeFi assets. Taking advantage of the extremely efficient and low-cost Oasis Network, Fountain Protocol establishes a multi-revenue protocol with a fund pool as the core and multiple application scenarios.
